constituent: echo, home town, cocoon, silver, city walls, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, tongue wagging
koohiiStory1: People´s voices are like echoes of sounds from their hometowns....you can always tell where they´re from by how they talk.
koohiiStory2: My hometown is a ghost town, any sounds echoes and echoes.
words:
反響(はんきょう): echo, reverberation, repercussion, reaction, influence
影響(えいきょう): influence, effect
響き(ひびき): echo, sound, reverberation, noise
響く(ひびく): to sound, echo, reverberate
